name: Editor AI
description: Generate Geometry Dash levels using AI!

ai-provider.name: AI Provider
ai-provider.description: Which AI service to use. Configure the corresponding section below for your chosen provider.

difficulty.name: Difficulty
difficulty.description: Default difficulty level for generated levels

style.name: Style
style.description: Visual style preference for generated levels

max-objects.name: Max Objects
max-objects.description: Maximum number of objects the AI may place per generation

spawn-batch-size.name: Spawn Speed (Objects/Tick)
spawn-batch-size.description: How many objects to place per tick after generation. Higher = faster but may cause brief lag on large levels. 8 is a good balance.

gemini-model.name: Gemini Model
gemini-model.description: Google Gemini model to use when AI Provider is set to 'gemini'

gemini-api-key.name: Gemini API Key
gemini-api-key.description: Your Google AI Studio API key

claude-model.name: Claude Model
claude-model.description: Anthropic Claude model to use when AI Provider is set to 'claude'

openai-model.name: OpenAI Model
openai-model.description: OpenAI model to use when AI Provider is set to 'openai'

ministral-model.name: Ministral Model
ministral-model.description: Mistral AI model to use when AI Provider is set to 'ministral'

use-platinum.name: Use Platinum (Cloud)
use-platinum.description: Use the EditorAI Platinum cloud Ollama service instead of a local Ollama instance

ollama-model.name: Ollama Model
ollama-model.description: Which EditorAI Ollama model to use

enable-rate-limiting.name: Enable Rate Limiting
enable-rate-limiting.description: Prevents excessive API calls to save tokens and avoid rate limits

rate-limit-seconds.name: Minimum Seconds Between Requests
rate-limit-seconds.description: Minimum time between API requests (prevents spam)

enable-advanced-features.name: Enable Advanced Features
enable-advanced-features.description: Unlocks all experimental AI capabilities. May produce less stable results.
